english.segment1: Some days I just want to scream everything that I believe in. Oh, theres a love that will quench your soul and show you what life is. But then I turn in fear and doubt that someone will hear me. That they will all just laugh in face and call me crazy
english.segment2: Oh whyd I back down. Ive got to share my heart. Turn this world around
english.segment3: Chorus. Say, what you believe. Come on and shout it out loud. Say, what you believe. Say, what you believe. Come on and live it out loud. Say, what you believe
english.segment4: Verse 2. Some say that Im wasting my time with the one love I believe in. I cant deny that this feeling inside has got me seein. Eternity comes to those who believe when this world starts fadin. So go ahead and laugh in my face and call me crazy
english.segment5: Oh I wont back down. Im gonna share my heart. Turn this world around
english.segment6: Bridge. Everybody come and rise up together. Take a stand, dont be afraid of the pressure. And with one voice were gonna cry out forever. Every mother father sister brother. Reach out for each other cmon
